message: I have to do something!
I try to force myself up...
But my arms and legs give out almost immediately.
My throat is parched too, so it's hard to even swallow.
But this is my only chance to escape!
As I struggle again to rise, I hear the door open.
Ryuuhou?!
I hear something patter across the tatami, and then something soft touches my bare back.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren?!"
The blue ball of fur jumps down in front of me and licks my face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you doing here?"

name: 蓮
message: "I slipped out of your bag on the way in and went for help."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Help? Who did you..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku?!"

name: 蓮
message: "Locating him was no simple task."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren... You're the best."
Ren's tail wags happily.

name: 紅雀
message: "You okay?"
Koujaku leans over to look me in the eye.
For a moment, the incident at Glitter flashes through my mind.
But it vanishes the moment I see Koujaku's worried expression.

name: 紅雀
message: "Can you move?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I can't get up. Asshole slipped me something..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Just hang on."
He pulls my shirt down and wraps my arm around his shoulder.
Then he slowly helps me up, supporting me by my waist.
With Koujaku's assistance, I somehow manage to get into a sitting position.
My arms and legs are still numb. I keep feeling like I might fall over any moment, and breathing is a little difficult.

name: 紅雀
message: "Does it hurt?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm fine..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Wait, isn't this..."
Koujaku surveys the room with obvious disgust.
When he sees the tattoo designs and the tools lying next to the futon, a quiet anger sparks in his eyes.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Oh, sorry. There's just something unsettling about this place. We should get out of here ASAP."
His scowl vanishes when he notices me staring. He then plants his feet and starts to lift me up.
And that's when the door opens.

name: 竜峰
message: "...Well, well."
Ryuuhou is staring at us, wide-eyed.

name: 竜峰
message: "A thief sneaking in while the master is away? Awfully brazen."

name: 紅雀
message: "Motherfucker..."
Koujaku lets me go and stands, glaring at Ryuuhou with terrifying intensity.
I can practically see the rage rising from his body, like black flames.

name: 紅雀
message: "I've been looking for you."
...What?
What the hell?
Ryuuhou touches a hand to his lips, thinking.

name: 竜峰
message: "I don't mean to be rude, but have we met? You seem to be acquainted with my friend Aoba here."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't give me that bullshit. No way you forgot. You know damn well what you did..."

name: 竜峰
message: "What I did?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You saying you forgot about this?!"
Koujaku pulls back his bangs.
In the light of the paper lanterns, the right side of his face is laid bare.
He has a tattoo there.
So it's not just his back...
Seeing it, Ryuuhou's eyes begin to sparkle.
And then, he grins.

name: 竜峰
message: "Just having some fun. Not a day goes by I don't think about you."

name: 竜峰
message: "I'll never forget how I adorned your raw, virgin flesh. Koujaku... my unfinished masterpiece."

name: 紅雀
message: "Fuck you. What the hell were you doing to Aoba?"

name: 竜峰
message: "Nothing. Yet. I was just getting to the good part when you showed up. You've always had such wonderful timing."

name: 竜峰
message: "I knew you were in town. You were on the dance floor the other day, weren't you? I saw you."

name: 竜峰
message: "Didn't say anything, of course. No point unless you're the one chasing me."

name: 紅雀
message: "You piece of..."
Koujaku's voice quivers with barely contained rage, and this is the most animated I've seen Ryuuhou yet.
Koujaku's tattoos... Are they Ryuuhou's work?

name: 竜峰
message: "The more pure something is, the less resistant it is to change. It's so easy to take a virgin canvas and warp it beyond recognition."

name: 竜峰
message: "How would my flower warp this canvas? How would your pure, righteous heart twist?"

name: 竜峰
message: "I had to know. I had to know. So I carved, with all my body and soul. I put so much of myself into your tattoos, I wasn't sure I had anything left to give."

name: 紅雀
message: "Shut your fucking mouth!"

name: 竜峰
message: "Hehe."
Ryuuhou titters gleefully.

name: 竜峰
message: "Did you forget my warning? I told you to be careful, didn't I? You shouldn't let yourself get so worked up."

name: 竜峰
message: "Still, I never thought you'd actually come. I'm flattered, really. Haha! Such hunger."
Ryuuhou takes a step back.

name: 紅雀
message: "Where the fuck do you think you're going?!"

name: 竜峰
message: "I was right when I chose you. Now I have to see where this ends."

name: 竜峰
message: "Hate me, Koujaku. That's what you need. We're gonna have a blast."

name: 紅雀
message: "Ryuuhou!"
In the blink of an eye, Ryuuhou spins and flees the room.

name: 紅雀
message: "Wait!"
Koujaku tries to give chase, but I grab his sleeve.
I can't let him go like this. I don't know why, but I feel it in my gut.

name: 紅雀
message: "Let go!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Ryuuhou!"
With a roar that strikes me like a physical blow, Koujaku tries to tear his arm from my grasp.
